mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subject SET class_id = #{classId}, subject_name = #{subjectName}, score_type = #{scoreType}
mapper.select: SELECT A.aca_pic, C.subject_name, D.exam_date, D.processing_status FROM academy A INNER JOIN class B ON A.aca_id = B.aca_id INNER JOIN subject C ON B.class_id = C.class_id INNER JOIN grade D ON C.subject_id = D.subject_id WHERE A.aca_id = #{acaId} AND B.class_id = #{classId} LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}
